ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
des: "This is a delicious and easy hummus to make. It's great to replace the meat in sandwiches with this hummus - it gives the sandwich great flavor. You can add less lemon juice according to your preference. You can also add additional spices if you like. Enjoy with some chips!"
ins: Process black beans, lemon juice, basil, and garlic powder together in a food processor until thick.
